author: holiman
content: I'm going a bit back-and-forth with Danno on statetests, we're almost in sync now. Besu had some issues, geth had some issues, I pushed another fix five minutes ago

author: _shemnon
content: Besu and Geth are now aligned with the tests I can run.  There are some tests that weren't run because their gas limits need to be increased, but those are solveable.

author: shamatar
content: There is an update on gas prices that is drafted only at the moment https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2999 I can either push it before YoloV2 (it only requires 3 constants updates in 2537) or can postpone it
